review: This review is mainly a warning for people who are buying this device primarily for the Twitch app.  As of April 5th, 2015, the Twitch App is TERRIBLE.  Non-stop buffering and freezing with a very strong internet connection.  The whole reason I bought this fire stick was for the Twitch App. I already have an Apple TV but was interested in the different Apps available on Amazon's option.  I regret buying this device but am holding on to in the hopes that Amazon will improve the Twitch App so that it becomes actually watchable.  PLEASE FIX TWITCH.
